title: Tokeijikake no Ringo
sinopse:
Short stories collection of a variety of more mature Tezuka works.

1. Shokei wa 3-ji ni Owatta (The Execution Ended At Three)
2. Seijo Kainin (Immaculation Conception)
3. Tokeijikake no Ringo (Clockwork Apple)
4. Bypass no Yoru (Night On The Bypass)
5. Fukuro (Pouch)
6. Yellow Dust
7. Akuma no Kaimaku (Curtains)
8. Kikansha (Return Ship)
